resources.string:
Do you really want to Upload Your Choir Audio/song here ? 
 if is yes Before you start creating your release, make sure you have everything you need for the upload like :Photo of Choir , collect name of music 

 *Audio files must meet the following requirements: 
 -Only catholic songs 
 -No Artist song
-Official Audio 
 -to protect our privacy , Audio does not belong to catholic it will be removed 
-make sure your Audio was not uploaded here 
-a copyrighted audio may not be published.

With this indirimbo za kiliziya catholic app , 
 you can listen to all musics and play hundreds of songs of catholic choirs made 
 in ( kinyarwanda/ burundi) 
 - from all over the country .



 Listen, sing and learn
